feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 10:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
